channel.title: Svn Export Alternative on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Svn Export Alternative on PR

item.title: SVN: Export only updated files between 2 revisions
item.description: Are you someone like me who is looking for an SVN command that exports the files updated between two revisions? Until now, I used to say that there is no such command available in SVN by default, or maybe now they have a feature to build in the next release.
